tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: An empty tavern, you can go outside via a door to your south, or up, there is a table and a mug
tavern.onExamine: It's an empty tavern, you can go outside via a door to your south, or up, there is a table [[imug01:taken:false==and a mug]]

bedroom.name: Bedroom
bedroom.description: An empty bedroom, there is a bed, a stairwell leads down, a box shows the number [[ibox:val:val]]
bedroom.onExamine: An empty bedroom, there is a bed, a stairwell leads down

outside.name: Outside
outside.description: It is dark, there is a tavern to your north[[routside:moon:true==, the moon is out]]
